entries.vote_challenge_too_many: There are already a maximum number of no-confidence challenges active.
entries.challenge_too_soon: You cannot issue a no-confidence challenge against another member for another %TO
entries.no_challenge_vote_leader: As the Council Leader, you cannot issue a no-confidence challenge vote.
entries.no_challenge_vote_low_rank: You must be at least Rank 1 in order to issue a no-confidence challenge vote.
entries.challenge_vote_begun_body: %TT has initiated a no-confidence challenge vote against %TO.  It is your Enclave duty to vote for or against this motion as soon as possible.
entries.vote_challenge_initiated: You issue a no-confidence challenge against %TO.
entries.vote_challenge_already_challenged: %TO is already in the process of a no-confidence challenge.
entries.vote_challenge_not_enough_xp: You do not have enough Force Rank experience to issue a no-confidence challenge.  Note that you can not spend experience if it would cause you to lose rank.
entries.vote_challenge_not_correct_rank: You can only issue a no-confidence challenge against one rank above your own.
entries.challenge_vote_select_name: Select the name of the Jedi you wish to issue a no-confidence challenge vote.  The cost of calling for such a vote is 1000 Force Rank experience per rank challenged.  If successful that Jedi will be demoted one rank.
entries.challenge_vote_success: You have successfully cast your no-confidence vote.
entries.vote_failed: The vote as failed due to an internal error.
entries.challenge_vote_record_vote: Select the no-confidence challenge for which you wish to vote.
entries.challenge_vote_status_select: Select a no-confidence challenge you wish to view.
entries.no_challenge_votes: There are not any active no-confidence votes at this time.
entries.challenge_vote_fail_body:
The vote against %TT has failed to pass with %TO votes for and %DI votes against.
(Note that for a vote to succeed,  two-thirds or more must be for it.)
entries.challenge_vote_success_body: The vote against %TT has succeeded with %TO votes for and %DI votes against.
entries.challenge_vote_cancelled_body: The no-confidence vote on %TO has been cancelled due to a change in the member's ranking.
entries.vote_cycle_begun_body:
Voting has started for promotions into %TO.  It is part of your Enclave duties to cast your vote for the petitioner who you deem most worthy.  

Voting time remaining: %TT
entries.items_recovered: You have been issued a new set of Jedi rank items from the terminal.
entries.acceptance_expired_body: Your deadline for accepting a promotion to %TO has passed.  You will have to petition and then win another vote in order to achieve this rank.
entries.demote_request_body_rank: Using Rank privilege, %TU has demoted %TT by one rank.
entries.promotion_already_have_rank: You have already achieved this rank.
entries.xp_maintenance_body:
You have lost %DI Force Rank experience.  All members of Rank 1 or higher must pay experience each day to remain in their current positions.

(Note: This loss may not take effect until your next login.)
entries.demote_request_body: Using Rank privilege, %TO has demoted you one rank.
entries.insufficient_experience: You do not have enough experience to cover the %DI cost without losing a rank.
entries.demote_player_changed_rank: That member's rank has changed since you have made your selection.
entries.demote_select_player: Select the member that you wish to demote.  Once you make this selection, it may not be undone.
entries.no_players_in_rank: There are no members in that rank.
entries.demote_too_soon: You cannot demote a member for another %TO
entries.demote_too_low_rank: You must be at least two Tiers higher than that of the rank you wish to demote.  The Council Leader may demote anyone.
entries.demote_select_rank: Select the rank whose member you wish to demote.
entries.vote_missed_body:
You have missed a promotion vote for %TO.  As a result, you have lost %DI Force Ranking experience.

(Note: This loss may not take effect until your next login.)
entries.demote_xp_debt_body: You have been demoted for failing to fulfill your Enclave duties.
entries.vote_last_seat_taken_body: The last available seat for %TO has been filled.  When another becomes available, you will be notified.  As long as you remain eligible for %TO, you will be able to accept the promotion without a further vote.
entries.vote_seat_available_body: A council seat has become available for %TO.  Since you won the last voting session, you may now claim this seat by going to the voting pedestal and selecting
entries.vote_win_no_slot_body: You have won the vote by your Enclave peers in order to achieve a higher ranking.  Unforuntately, there are no longer any open seats for you to fill.  As a result, you will be offered a chance to accept an open seat the next time one becomes available.
entries.vote_win_body: Your Enclave peers have decided that you are worthy of a promotion within the  hierarchy.  You should return to your Enclave as soon as possible and select
entries.petition_already_have_rank: You have already attained this rank.
entries.acceptance_time_expired: Time has expired for accepting promotions.
entries.vote_time_expired: Time has expired for the voting process.
entries.vote_petition_select: Select the rank for which you wish to petition for membership.
entries.petitioning_not_eligible: You are not eligible to petition for this rank.
entries.petitioning_no_room: There is already the maximum number of petitioners.
entries.petitioning_complete: You add your name to the list of petitioners.
entries.already_petitioning: You are already petitioning for this rank.
entries.petition_not_open: Petitioning for this rank is not currently open.
entries.not_eligible_for_promotion: You are not eligible to accept the promotion.  If you can meet the eligibility before the acceptance period expires, you can still receive the promotion.
entries.not_a_winner: You must win the vote before you can accept a promotion.
entries.acceptance_not_open: It is not currently time to accept promotions.
entries.vote_record_select_player: Select the petitioner to whom you wish to promote.
entries.noone_to_vote_for: There is no one for which to vote.
entries.cant_vote_for_rank: You are not allowed to cast votes for promotions to that rank.
entries.voting_not_open: Voting for that rank is not currently open.
entries.vote_promotion_select: Select the rank for which you wish to accept a promotion.
entries.vote_record_select: Select the rank for which you wish to record your vote.
entries.vote_status_select: Select the rank whose status you wish to view.
entries.insufficient_rank_vote: You have insufficient rank in order to vote.
entries.council_joined:
You have joined the %TO.

(Note: You can use /showCouncilRank to see the hierarchy.)
entries.rank_gained: You have achieved the Enclave rank of %TO.
entries.experience_lost: You have lost %DI Force Rank experience.
entries.experience_granted: You have gained %DI Force Rank experience.
